attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brian May of Rock Group Queen Should be Knighted for his work in the music industry & the joy he has given people all over the world. Also the work he has done promoting the country in a positive light when our standing around the world has not been as high as we would like.
Also this man has the commitment to help save the radio station Planet Rock
& bring joy to a part of the population that is often over looked

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
